com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium

Class ByLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openqa.selenium.By
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.ByLabel

  • public class ByLabel
extends org.openqa.selenium.By

    An implementation of By which can find HTML elements by the element's label.

    Since:
    1.3.0
    Author:
    Joshua Barclay

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.openqa.selenium.By

      static String XPATH_LABEL_TEXT_CONTAINS_RELATIVE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByLabel(String labelId)
      ByLabel using the label's ID.
      ByLabel(String labelText, boolean partialMatch)
      ByLabel using the label's text, either as an exact or partial match.
      ByLabel(String labelText, boolean partialMatch, boolean relative)
      ByLabel using the label's text, either as an exact or partial match and using a relative XPATh to explicitly look 'inside' the current element.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ByLabel

        public ByLabel(String labelId)
        ByLabel using the label's ID.
        Parameters:
        labelId - the ID of the label.

      • ByLabel

        public ByLabel(String labelText,
       boolean partialMatch,
       boolean relative)
        ByLabel using the label's text, either as an exact or partial match and using a relative XPATh to explicitly look 'inside' the current element.
        Parameters:
        labelText - the text used to find the label
        partialMatch - whether it can be a partial text match
        relative - whether to use a relative xpath lookup

      • ByLabel

        public ByLabel(String labelText,
       boolean partialMatch)
        ByLabel using the label's text, either as an exact or partial match.
        Parameters:
        labelText - the text used to find the label.
        partialMatch - whether it can be a partial text match.
